entry.title: Tomb Raider
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼š$990.00 â†’ $830.00 ï¼‰

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

Before you buy, please expand this description and check that your computer matches or exceeds each of the requirements listed. When a young Lara Croft is shipwrecked on an uncharted island, she enters a fight for survival armed with nothing but her instincts. Help Lara perfect her natural gifts as she embarks on a perilous journey to save her friends and escape the islandâ€™s murderous inhabitants. Scavenge vital resources, upgrade Laraâ€™s gear and improve her exploration, combat and survival skills to fight back against vicious enemies. Jump and climb through dense forests, treacherous mountains and WWII bunkers to discover how an ordinary young woman became Lara Croft, Tomb Raider. Download the Single Player DLC pack for free skins, abilities, and the Tomb of the Lost Adventurer. Important information regarding Tomb Raider: The game is officially supported on the following Macs. To check your Mac model and when it was released, select About This Mac from the Apple menu on your menu bar. â€¢ All 13â€ MacBook Pros released since Mid 2012 â€¢ All 12â€ MacBooks released since Early 2016 â€¢ All 15â€ MacBook Pros released since Mid 2012 â€¢ All Mac minis released since Late 2012 â€¢ All 21.5â€ iMacs released since Late 2012 â€¢ All 27â€ iMacs released since Late 2012 â€¢ All 27" iMac Pros released since Late 2017 â€¢ All Mac Pros released since Late 2013 The following Macs are capable of running the game but do not consistently meet the standards required for official support. â€¢ All 12â€ MacBooks released since Early 2015 â€¢ Minimum System Requirements: â—¦ Processor: 1.1GHz â—¦ RAM: 4GB â—¦ Graphics: 512MB â—¦ macOS: 10.14 â—¦ Free Space: 14GB Check the Feral website for more detailed specifications. â€¢ Supports many different models of gamepad. For a full list check the Feral support site. â€¢ This game is not currently supported on volumes formatted as Case-sensitive. TOMB RAIDER Â© 2013-2019 Square Enix Ltd. All Rights Reserved. TOMB RAIDER, CRYSTAL DYNAMICS, the CRYSTAL DYNAMICS logo, EIDOS, the EIDOS logo and LARA CROFT are registered trademarks or trademarks of Square Enix Ltd. SQUARE ENIX and the SQUARE ENIX logo are registered trademarks or trademarks of Square Enix Holdings Co., Ltd. All rights reserved. Uses FMOD Ex Sound System Â© 1994-2019 Firelight Technologies Pty Ltd. Uses Scaleform GFx Â© 2013-2019 Scaleform Corporation. Developed for and published on the macOS by Feral Interactive Ltd. Mac, macOS and the Mac logo are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. Feral and the Feral logo are trademarks of Feral Interactive Ltd. All other marks are property of their respective owners. All rights reserved.
